statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedules ORDER BY schedule_date DESC, start_time ASC, end_time ASC
SELECT schedule_date, start_time, end_time FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE employee_id = 1
SELECT employee_id, shift_id, schedule_date FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE schedule_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE shift_id = 2 ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT end_time, start_time, schedule_date FROM EmployeeSchedules ORDER BY end_time DESC
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE schedule_date = '2022-10-10'
SELECT employee_id, start_time, end_time FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE shift_id = 3 ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE start_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00' ORDER BY schedule_date ASC
SELECT employee_id, shift_id FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE employee_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND end_time < '16:00:00'
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-10-01' AND schedule_date <= '2022-10-31' ORDER BY employee_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT * FROM Schedule WHERE shift_type = 'Morning';
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_name, start_date, end_date FROM Employee INNER JOIN Schedule ON Employee.employee_id = Schedule.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT'
SELECT employee_name, position FROM Employee WHERE employee_id = 101
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY department ASC
SELECT e.employee_name, s.shift_type, s.start_date FROM Employee e JOIN Schedule s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE s.shift_type = 'Morning' AND s.start_date >= '2021-10-01'
SELECT department, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM Employee GROUP BY department ORDER BY total_employees DESC
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT name, department FROM Employee WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, name, department, position FROM Employee ORDER BY department DESC, employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ShiftRotation WHERE start_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT request_id, leave_type, start_date, end_date FROM LeaveRequest WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM Employee ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT e.name, e.position, l.leave_type FROM Employee e JOIN LeaveRequest l ON e.employee_id = l.employee_id;
SELECT e.department, COUNT(*) AS num_employees FROM Employee e GROUP BY e.department HAVING num_employees > 1;
SELECT l.employee_id, l.start_date, l.end_date, e.name AS employee_name, e.position AS employee_position FROM LeaveRequest l JOIN Employee e ON l.employee_id = e.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT employee_id, name, department, position FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM Schedule WHERE shift_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-15';
SELECT request_id, start_date, end_date, reason FROM LeaveRequest ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT e.name, s.shift_date, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM Employee e JOIN Schedule s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id;
SELECT e.name, l.start_date, l.end_date, l.reason FROM Employee e JOIN LeaveRequest l ON e.employee_id = l.employee_id WHERE l.reason LIKE '%vacation%';
SELECT e.name, s.shift_date, s.start_time, sr.shift_type FROM Employee e JOIN Schedule s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id JOIN ShiftRotation sr ON s.start_time = sr.start_time;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT employee_id, position FROM Employee WHERE department='HR';
SELECT * FROM Leave_Request WHERE status='pending';
SELECT employee_name, start_time, end_time FROM Employee E JOIN Employee_Schedule ES ON E.employee_id = ES.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM Employee_Schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT employee_id, start_time, end_time FROM Employee_Schedule WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'Sales' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT request_id, employee_id, start_date, end_date, status FROM Leave_Request WHERE status = 'pending' AND start_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT department_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM Department JOIN Employee ON Department.department_id = Employee.department_id GROUP BY department_name;
